author: The Hindu
title: Safe forests, safe people: On wildlife conservation
description: Destruction of forests sends wild animals, and the deadly viruses they carry, closer to humans
content: The rapid spread of the SARS-CoV-2 virus across the world has focused attention on the seemingly invisible processes that help pathogens originally found in wild animals make the leap to humans. Diseases of animal origin such as Ebola, HIV, Severe Acute Respi… [+2617 chars]
